name: AVS Video Editor Project File
summary: Learn about .VEP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: VEP files use XML formatting but save some blocks of binary data encoded as text for video and image thumbnails.

description: Video editing project created by AVS Video Editor, a program used for making movies and home videos; saves the movie timeline and references to audio and video clips, which are stored in a \​Content\​ folder alongside the project.
